description:
After crossing paths, Hayate and Hinagiku meet at the battle ground known as Hakuo Academy. A sleeping Hinagiku…A broken tea cup…The lost 10,000 yen…The weirdly-colored red monster…The movie ticket…All these random items and happenings were in fact all part of a clever plot schemed by Izumi, Risa and Miki.
Source: crunchyroll
